content: *the ripple stitch crocheted afghan is reborn in comfort s new interior colors and now we call it a designer throw berroco * skill level easy berroco comfort 100 grs 4 balls a and 3 balls each b c d and e see pattern for colorway olive and colorway grape details crochet hook size 6 00 mm j or size to obtain gauge pattern 1-row repeat after first row work through the back loop of stitches from berroco booklet #214 originally shown in berroco softwist additional information 1 1 http //archive berroco com/214/214_madrid_pv html
